thread.section_title: Kourtney Kardashian News and Instagram Photos from KUWTK Star | Daily Mail Online
thread.title: takes children out on the West Coast
thread.title_full: Kourtney Kardashian takes children out on the West Coast | Daily Mail Online

author: Chelsea White For Dailymail.com
title: takes children out on the West Coast
text:
At one point in time the rapper's Yeezy launches were a family affair, but now the reality star clan are doing their own thing.
As brother-in-law Kanye West released his Yeezy Season 5 onto the world in New York Fashion Week, Kourtney Kardashian focused on her immediate family's creative pursuits.
The 37-year-old star took son Mason and daughter Penelope to music class in Calabasas, California , on Wednesday.
Fun with mom: Kourtney Kardashian took son Mason and daughter Penelope to music class in Calabasas, California, on Wednesday
While usually she tries to attend Kanye's fashion shows and concerts, clearly making sure her children were getting a chance to express themselves was more important.
Penelope did put on her own little Yeezy show anyway, with the tot heading out in a raw edged earth toned skirt and top very reminiscent of her uncle's designs.
She also wore a pair of his recently released toddler Yeezy sneakers.
The four-year-old's brother also showed off his fashion chops, with Mason wearing a pair of grey sweats with skulls on the knees.
Sing it out: As brother-in-law Kanye West released his Yeezy Season 5 onto the world in New York Fashion Week, Kourtney focused on her immediate family's creative pursuits
Yeezus II: Penelope did put on her own little Yeezy show anyway, with the tot heading out in a raw edged earth toned skirt and top very reminiscent of her uncle's designs and a pair of his toddler sized sneakers
Cool kid: The four-year-old's brother also showed off his fashion chops, with Mason wearing a pair of grey sweats with skulls on the knees
The seven-year-old wore the pants with an oversize black T-shirt, slip-on shoes and a gold chain.
Mom Kourtney also pushed some fashion boundaries in her far from usual errands look.
The reality star headed out in a pair of distressed jeans with a rip which exposed most of her right leg.
Stylish mommy: Mom Kourtney also pushed some fashion boundaries in her far from usual errands look
Dare to bare: The reality star headed out in a pair of distressed jeans with a rip which exposed most of her right leg
Added extras: The star wore ta vintage T-shirt tucked into the jeans and accessorized the look with a pair of black pumps and a cap from label MSFTFrepublic
Kourt paired the vintage style denim with a long sleeve T-shirt - which was also vintage.
The star wore the T-shirt tucked into the jeans and accessorized the look with a pair of black pumps and a cap from label MSFTFrepublic.
While she may have not been in New York she was thinking about her sister Kim, who was on the East Coast supporting Kanye.
Big day: Across the country, Kanye launched his new collection with Kim Kardashian in tow
Sweet sister: While she may have not been in New York she was thinking about her sister Kim, sending her a Valentines Day gift
Kourtney shipped long stemmed red roses to her sister for Valentine's Day.
Kourt also got something for Valentine's Day from her sister Khloe.
The card read: 'You are my Mary Kate to my Ashley. The Whitney to my Bobby. The milk to my cereal. I love you more than working out and Kit Kat.'
Feel the love: Kourt also got something for Valentine's Day from her sister Khloe
